description:
Peter has no choice. If he wants to rid himself of Lisa once and for all, he must become the ultimate wingman and help Spartokos get laid.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Peter Grill and the Warrior That Shouted Love
Peter Grill e o Guerreiro que Gritou Amor
Peter Grill et le cri d`amour de l`ogre
Peter Grill to Ai o Sakenda Senki
Peter Grill und der Oger, der nach Liebe ruft
بيتر غريل والمحارب الذي صرخ بالحب
ピーター・グリルと愛を叫んだ戦鬼
